thread.title: Dale Ann Bradley coming to the Mountain Arts Community Center
thread.title_full: Dale Ann Bradley coming to the Mountain Arts Community Center

title: Dale Ann Bradley coming to the Mountain Arts Community Center
text: Share Updated: 10:43 pm Chattanooga, TN (WDEF) - Award winning Bluegrass Vocalist, Dale Ann Bradley will soon perform at the Mountain Arts Community Center.Barb Storm with the Community Center joined John on Prime News at 7 to talk about the event.Cody Harvey with the Mountain Cove Bluegrass band also came to give us a taste of some bluegrass.Watch the video for more details.The event takes place this Friday at 7 p.m. on Signal Mountain.Tickets are $8 for children 12 and under, $15 for adults, and $12 dollars for seniors at the Community Center.
